calculateParticipantFee(uint256,uint256).details: Calculate fee when investor buy token

returns._0: Return amount of fee when investor buy token

params.addrs: Array of address includes: - address of IDO token, - address of purchase token
params.uints: Array of pool information includes: - max purchase amount for KYC user, - max purchase amount for Not KYC user, - token fee percentage, - galaxy participation fee percentage, - crowdfunding participation fee percentage, - galaxy pool proportion, - early access proportion, - total raise amount, - whale open time, - whale duration, - community duration, - rate of IDO token (based on README formula), - decimal of IDO token (based on README formula, is different from decimals in contract of IDO token), - TGE date, - TGE percentage, - vesting cliff, - vesting frequency, - number of vesting release
